original_text: Now as Peter went here and there among them all, he came down also to the saints who lived at Lydda.
korean_text: 그 때에 베드로가 사방으로 두루 다니다가 룻다에 사는 성도들에게도 내려갔더니

sentences.original_text: Now as Peter went here and there among them all
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 베드로가 그들 모두 가운데 두루 다니면서

sentences.original_text: he came down also to the saints
